sourcing.instructions: - Bismuth Oxide: Available through chemical suppliers or online marketplaces.
steps: - Bismuth Oxide: Available through chemical suppliers or online marketplaces.
1. Weigh 98.00 g of Bismuth Oxide and 54.00 g of Copper(II) Oxide using an analytical balance.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Weigh 98.00 g of Bismuth Oxide and 54.00 g of Copper(II) Oxide using an analytical balance.

steps: 1. Transfer the paste into a crucible suitable for high-temperature applications.
heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the paste into a crucible suitable for high-temperature applications.

steps: 1. Turn off the furnace and allow the crucible to cool to room temperature gradually.
cooling.raw_text: 1. Turn off the furnace and allow the crucible to cool to room temperature gradually.

steps: 1. Once cooled, remove the sample from the crucible carefully.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, remove the sample from the crucible carefully.
